CustomField.formula:
/*buildertek__Committed_Costs__c + buildertek__Direct_Costs__c + buildertek__Pending_Costs__c + buildertek__Additional_Costs__c*/
Committed_Costs__c + Direct_Costs__c + Additional_Costs__c + Invoice_total__c + Labor__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Committed Costs + Direct Costs + Additional Costs + Invoices + Labor
CustomField.label: Total Costs
